contractCaller.name: contract caller
contractCaller.description: Represents an external blockchain wallet or contracts with the ability of acting as blockhcain wallets (gnosis, governance contracts, etc).

erc20receiver.name: erc20 receiver
erc20receiver.description: Represents a smart contract which is safe to receive any erc20 because it provides ways for one or more accounts to recover the tokens.

ethReceiver.name: eth receiver
ethReceiver.description: Represents a smart contract which is safe to receive native coin because it provides ways for one or more accounts to recover the sent coins.

unixTimestamp.name: unix timestamp
unixTimestamp.description: Describes point in time. It is the number of seconds that have elapsed since the Unix epoch, excluding leap seconds. The Unix epoch is 00:00:00 UTC on 1 January 1970.

durationSeconds.name: duration
durationSeconds.description: Represents the duration period in seconds.

blockNumber.name: block number
blockNumber.description: Describes point in time in a form of block number.

durationBlocks.name: duration in blocks
durationBlocks.description: Represents the duration period expressed in number of blocks.
